sqlMap.insert: insert into stock_daily_data (stock_daily_id, stock_code, trading_date, opening_price, closing_price, highest_price, lowest_price, gmt_create, gmt_modified, trading_volume, trading_amount) values (#stockDailyId#, #stockCode#, #currentDate#, #openingPrice#, #closingPrice#, #highestPrice#, #lowestPrice#, now(), now(), #tradingVolume#, #tradingAmount#);
sqlMap.select: select stock_daily_id, stock_code, trading_date, opening_price, closing_price, highest_price, lowest_price, gmt_create, gmt_modified, trading_volume, trading_amount from stock_daily_data where trading_date >= #startDate# and trading_date <= #endDate# and stock_code = #stockCode# order by trading_date asc;

select stock_daily_id, stock_code, trading_date, opening_price, closing_price, highest_price, lowest_price, gmt_create, gmt_modified, trading_volume, trading_amount from stock_daily_data where trading_date >= #date# and stock_code = #stockCode# order by trading_date asc;

select stock_daily_id, stock_code, trading_date, opening_price, closing_price, highest_price, lowest_price, gmt_create, gmt_modified, trading_volume, trading_amount from stock_daily_data where trading_date <= #date# and stock_code = #stockCode# order by trading_date desc limit #k#;
update stock_daily_data set stock_name = #stockName# where stock_code = #stockCode#;
